summary: Build an inspiration-sharing app (Pinterest-like) with posting plus real-time communication features: messaging, voice calls, and video chat.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal modern logo mark: abstract pin + spark motif, flat vector style (logo-mark.dim_512x512.png)
- Empty state illustration: cozy desk with moodboard/collage elements, warm palette, flat vector style (empty-feed.dim_1200x800.png)
- Empty state illustration: two chat bubbles with small collage scraps, warm palette, flat vector style (empty-messages.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and a basic user profile model (display name, avatar, bio) that is persisted in the Motoko canister and shown in the UI.
Add core content features for a Pinterest-like inspiration feed: create posts with an image and caption, browse a home feed, view a post detail page, and list a userâ€™s posts on their profile.
Add lightweight discovery tools: search posts by caption/tags and allow browsing by tag.
Implement 1:1 in-app messaging between users with conversation list, message history, and sending new messages; use a polling-based refresh strategy (no WebSockets).

Provide 1:1 calling flows for voice and video chat using browser-based peer-to-peer media (WebRTC) with canister-mediated signaling suitable for a non-WebSocket environment (e.g., polling). Include an incoming call prompt, in-call controls, and call termination.

Create a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the app (colors, typography, layout, and component styling) and apply it consistently across feed, post creation, post detail, profile, messaging, and calling screens (avoid blue/purple as primary colors unless required).

Add generated static image assets (logo/app mark and a small set of empty-state illustrations) and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve generated images through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Pinterest-like inspiration discovery experience (browse/search inspiration content)
User posting feature for inspiration content
Real-time calling features: voice calls and video chat between users
